channel.title: Web Development on Dominic's Sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on Dominic's Sandbox

item.title: Why I Switched from Jekyll to Hugo (And Why You Might Want To, Too)
item.description: Migrating from Jekyll to Hugo wasn’t as smooth as I expected, but it was worth it. Here’s what broke, what I learned, and why I’ll never go back.

item.title: The Browser Wars: My Exhausting Journey to Finding the Least Annoying Setup
item.description: Choosing a browser shouldn't be this hard. From Safari’s WebKit prison to Windows’ Chromium clones, here’s my exhausting browser journey.
